name: Volttron
description: Volttron is a retro-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot that is part of the WebtrES club. With its shiny yellow box and red-black screen, it captures the essence of nostalgic technology. Equipped with soldier-like arms and legs, it stands tall and sturdy. Its retro console buttons allow for precise control and analysis. To protect itself, Volttron is always adorned with a stylish helmet. With its cutting-edge technology and vintage charm, Volttron is ready to take on any electronic challenge.
